name: Die, Wizard!
description:
Made in 6 hours for GMTK Jam 2022!

----

Rules:

WASD to move, mouse to shoot

Rolls of the dice determine the two nouns that make up your spell!

Kill an enemy for 1 point, roll the dice for 100 points!

---

Chaoclypse - Design, Programming, Art

Nokia - Design

Vav - Music
